thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb for London Eye
thread.title_full: Superb for London Eye - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LorraineAJ
title: Superb for London Eye
text: Family room (quad) on 12th floor was comfortable and gave us a great view of the Eye. 5 mins from Waterloo, 10 mins to Parliament, Big Ben etc. Breakfast is good value and ample choice - bonus is that kids are free when an adult pays Â£10.50. Wifi is free and not limited to 30 mins like other chains. This Premier Inn also has a bit of character, being housed in a former maternity hospital. All in all this is now our first choice when visiting London as a family.
